BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations

Items.Title: Oversight – Examining the Civil Service System Part II
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations
A Local Law to amend the New York city charter in relation to using a machine readable format for the department of citywide administrative services’ quarterly provisional employee report.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Using a machine readable format for the department of citywide administrative services’ quarterly provisional employee report.

Items.Title: Oversight – Examining the Civil Service System Part II
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Examining the Civil Service System Part II

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter in relation to using a machine readable format for the department of citywide administrative services’ quarterly provisional employee report.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Using a machine readable format for the department of citywide administrative services’ quarterly provisional employee report.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Matteo, Kallos, Torres and Levine
